replace into t_device ( id, dev_type, type_id, name, addr, firmware_version, coords_x, coords_y, sn, parent_id, order_no, not_use, del_flag, create_date, update_date ) values ( #{id}, #{dev_type}, #{type_id}, #{name}, #{addr}, #{firmware_version}, #{coords_x}, #{coords_y}, #{sn}, #{parent_id}, #{order_no}, #{not_use}, #{del_flag}, #{create_date}, #{update_date} );
replace into t_device_detail( id, ip , port, uname , upwd , mac, imei , outer_id, online , comm_channel, freq_band, bus_addr, iccid , timeout) values ( #{id}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{uname} , #{upwd}, #{mac}, #{imei}, #{outer_id}, #{online}, #{comm_channel}, #{freq_band}, #{bus_addr}, #{iccid}, #{timeout} )
replace into pdf_org_image(id, name, image, container_width, container_height ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{image}, #{container_width}, #{container_height} )
